casebody.data:
IN RE: A.L.Z. 9P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 27, 2018 Robert W. Ewing, Attorney at Law, Clemmons, for Zedd, Teri.

Wayne A. Hollowell, Attorney at Law.

Mark L. Hayes, Attorney at Law, for Strader, Angel, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of February 2018 by Respondent-Mother for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of February 2018."
